flow.descriptionCdata:
5ac8fc48-e6b2-4f9c-aae1-fb6d9aa2afd8.04e5b619-0c2a-4781-a0e6-d2b2eeb7987a.description=This workflow adds/updates the component property using Artifact APIs. onlyUpdate\: yes/no yes - To update values of existing property (In this case input "valueType" is not required , This input will not be considered even if provided) no - To add/update property valueType - Value type of the property. It can have value from selection list "CSA-Property-ValueType". This Input is required only when Input "onlyUpdate" is selected as "no". values - One or more values dilimited by comma , (If user want to use some other separator for multiple values then needs to be pass as next input "separator") separator - A delimiter that separates elements in the values ( default dilimiter used is comma ,) 5ac8fc48-e6b2-4f9c-aae1-fb6d9aa2afd8.11335637-61f4-462e-a87d-3b2356d33853.prompt=Process Instance ID 5ac8fc48-e6b2-4f9c-aae1-fb6d9aa2afd8.21ed5468-5424-41a0-ac23-c6fd76b9f9ff.prompt=User Identifier 5ac8fc48-e6b2-4f9c-aae1-fb6d9aa2afd8.2b90586b-4460-4227-9b97-38af62236055.description=
Check to see if the value stored in a specified flow variable, denoted by key, is null.

Inputs\:
keyName - The key to check, i.e. the name of the flow variable.

Returns\: 
The value in the specified key, i.e. flow variable.

Responses\:
isNull - If the key is a null pointer, i.e. the flow variable doesn't have an assigned value.
notNull - If some value is stored in the key, i.e the flow variable has a value assigned.
5ac8fc48-e6b2-4f9c-aae1-fb6d9aa2afd8.346cf4f5-7f02-4238-b91d-1e23d44c0a95.description=
Thsi workflow retrieves all the child components of the input component id.

Inputs\:

artifactId		- Component id for which the child components wil be retrieved
userIdentifier	- User Identifier to pass to the wrapper flow to retrieve the child components

Responses\:
success - Workflow completed successfully.
failure - Something went wrong.
5ac8fc48-e6b2-4f9c-aae1-fb6d9aa2afd8.3860481a-022d-4e42-bff6-b9727f59ef0b.prompt=Artifact ID 5ac8fc48-e6b2-4f9c-aae1-fb6d9aa2afd8.4672b5c9-1dbd-4655-b9b8-519688d6d301.prompt=Process Instance ID 5ac8fc48-e6b2-4f9c-aae1-fb6d9aa2afd8.5339737a-6e45-4000-a637-3dbd6b00a70b.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State 5ac8fc48-e6b2-4f9c-aae1-fb6d9aa2afd8.5424dfd3-b467-4df3-a9e2-2f1830503237.prompt=User Identifier 5ac8fc48-e6b2-4f9c-aae1-fb6d9aa2afd8.80a4d954-ac8e-44c1-be0c-649fa6949c42.description=
Subtracts two numbers

Inputs\:
value1 - The first value.
value2 - The second value.

Returns\:
The difference of the two numbers.

Responses\:
success - The operation completed successfully.
failure - Something went wrong.
5ac8fc48-e6b2-4f9c-aae1-fb6d9aa2afd8.85ffb96d-9f33-488e-855f-65df48feb37f.prompt=User Identifier 5ac8fc48-e6b2-4f9c-aae1-fb6d9aa2afd8.91c587f2-f525-4e92-b347-d5d879fc53af.prompt=Process Instance ID 5ac8fc48-e6b2-4f9c-aae1-fb6d9aa2afd8.95d02cd8-4163-4c5f-b563-64761e3eeb92.prompt=User Identifier 5ac8fc48-e6b2-4f9c-aae1-fb6d9aa2afd8.982d546a-f311-45cd-a92b-af1ff6bb2c4f.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State 5ac8fc48-e6b2-4f9c-aae1-fb6d9aa2afd8.a3d727d4-20bf-477a-b0ea-be0c201dd952.prompt=User Identifier 5ac8fc48-e6b2-4f9c-aae1-fb6d9aa2afd8.ae8071a5-b3cb-43ab-b15f-c998df30c42b.description=This workflow returns the artifact's properties and values using Artifact APIs. result\: propertyNameValuesList\: pipe separated list of property name and values ( where each property name and values would be ; seprated and multiple values would be , seprated) e.g. - property 1; value1,value2|property 2; value3|property 3; value3,value4|........ 5ac8fc48-e6b2-4f9c-aae1-fb6d9aa2afd8.c581df53-a04c-44c7-a12b-6a7c5f12f732.prompt=User Identifier 5ac8fc48-e6b2-4f9c-aae1-fb6d9aa2afd8.cf704e82-e964-44f7-8413-f5bfc8e71574.prompt=Component ID 5ac8fc48-e6b2-4f9c-aae1-fb6d9aa2afd8.d425bb84-5d1c-4042-90fb-b8f7bdd7acfa.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State 5ac8fc48-e6b2-4f9c-aae1-fb6d9aa2afd8.description=
Provision a Server and add to the Server Group

Inputs Parameters\:

 CSA_CONTEXT_ID – CSA Context Id
 CSA_PROCESS_ID – CSA Process Instance Id
 SVC_COMPONENT_ID - This token will resolve to the Service component Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\:SVC_COMPONENT_ID]
 RSC_PROVIDER_ID - This token will resolve to the Resource Provider Id that was selected at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\:RSC_PROVIDER_ID]
 SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_EMAIL - This token will resolve to the subscriber’s email address. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_EMAIL]
 RSC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID - This token will resolve to the Resource Subscription Id that was created from the Resource Offering at the Subscription time.
  		Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID]
 SVC_COMPONENT_TYPE - This token will resolve to the Service component type. Eg\: Server.. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_COMPONENT_TYPE]
 RSC_POOL_ID - This token will resolve to the Resource pool Id that was selected at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_POOL_ID]
 SVC_INSTANCE_ID - This token will resolve to the Service Instance Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_INSTANCE_ID]
 SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID - This token will resolve to the Subscription Id that was created at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID]
 PRN_COMPONENT_ID – This token will resolve to the parent Component’s Service Component Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: PRN_COMPONENT_ID]
 REQ_ORG_ID - This token will resolve to the Organization Id associated with the service request. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: REQ_ORG_ID]
 REQ_USER_ID - This token will resolve to the User Id associated with the service request. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: REQ_USER_ID]
 USR_ORG_ID - This token will resolve to the Organization Id associated with the subscriber. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: USR_ORG_ID]
 RSC_BINDING_ID - This token will resolve to the Resource Binding Id that was created at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_BINDING_ID]

Responses\:
 success - The operation completed successfully.
 failure - Something went wrong.
5ac8fc48-e6b2-4f9c-aae1-fb6d9aa2afd8.eb09ad33-fef8-4a4f-9440-c6519a172522.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State 5ac8fc48-e6b2-4f9c-aae1-fb6d9aa2afd8.f006866f-e98a-4bf4-af91-e299d09b0cb0.prompt=Process Instance ID 5ac8fc48-e6b2-4f9c-aae1-fb6d9aa2afd8.fd6e8f79-05ed-42f3-8dac-00807f774e7e.description=
Thsi workflow retrieves all the child components of the input component id.

Inputs\:

artifactId		- Component id for which the child components wil be retrieved
userIdentifier	- User Identifier to pass to the wrapper flow to retrieve the child components

Responses\:
success - Workflow completed successfully.
failure - Something went wrong.
flow.name: vCenter Simple Compute - Server Group Flex-out Server

staticBinding.value: Adding server to the server group

step.name: Get Servers not in Stable State

staticBinding.value: Server has been added to your subscription - ${subscriptionName}
